1.text: Place the boxer briefs facing up on a flat surface and smooth out all the wrinkles.

2.text: Fold the left leg to the middle of the underwear.

3.text: Bring the right leg to the left side of the underwear.

4.text: Fold the waistband side halfway down.

5.text: Tuck the bottom half into the waistband.

6.text: Lay the boxer briefs face up on a flat surface.

7.text: Fold the boxer briefs in half.

8.text: Fold the underwear in half lengthwise again.

9.text: Fold the crotch side in thirds twice.

10.text: Place the boxer briefs facing up on a flat surface.

11.text: Fold the waistband down 2 inches (5.1 cm).

12.text: Fold the left leg of the underwear to the center.

13.text: Fold the right leg all the way to the left side.

14.text: Roll the bottom of the underwear up towards the waistband.

15.text: Tuck the rolled portion into the waistband.
